title: MAIPPE study schema
description: JSON-schema representing a study in MIAPPE v1.2. A study (or experiment) comprises a series of assays (or measurements) of one or more types, undertaken to answer a particular biological question.

study_unique_ID.description: DM-11: Unique identifier comprising the name or identifier for the institution/database hosting the submission of the study data, and the identifier of the study in that institution.

identifierSource.description: Information about the organisation or namespace responsible for creating and maintaining the identifier.

study_title.description: DM-12: Human-readable text summarising the study

study_description.description: DM-13: Human-readable text describing the study. (PPEO: has_start_date_time)

start_date_of_study.description: DM-14: Date and, if relevant, time when the experiment started (PPEO: has_start_date_time)

end_date_of_study.description: DM-15: Date and, if relevant, time when the experiment ended

contact_institution.description: DM-16: Name and address of the institution responsible for the study.

location.description: The geographical extension and span covered by the dataset and its measured dimensions/variables.  (PPEO: has_location). NOTE: THIS IS AN ALTERNATIVE TO USING HARD CODED KEYS

geographic location (country).description: DM-17: The country where the experiment took place, either as a full name or preferably as a 2-letter code.

experiment_site_name.description: DM-18: The name of the natural site, experimental field, greenhouse, phenotyping facility, etc. where the experiment took place.

geographic location (latitude).description: DM-19: Latitude of the experimental site in degrees, in decimal format.

geographic location (longitude).description: DM-20: Longitude of the experimental site in degrees, in decimal format.

geographic location (altitude).description: DM-21: Altitude of the experimental site, provided in metres (m).

description_of_the_experimental_design.description: DM-22: Short description of the experimental design, possibly including statistical design. In specific cases, e.g. legacy datasets or data computed from several studies, the experimental design can be 'unknown'/'NA', 'aggregated/reduced data', or simply 'none'.

type_of_study_design.description: DM-23: Type of experimental  design of the study, in the form of an accession number from the Crop Ontology.

observation_unit_level_hierarchy.description: DM-24: Hierarchy of the different levels of repetitions between each others

observation_unit_description.description: DM-25: General description of the observation units in the study.

description_of_growth_facility.description: DM-26: Short description of the facility in which the study was carried out.

type_of_growth_facility.description: DM-27: Type of growth facility in which the study was carried out, in the form of an accession number from the Crop Ontology.

cultural_practices.description: DM-28: General description of the cultural practices of the study.

map_of_experimental_design.description: DM-29: Representation of the experimental design.

environmentParameters.description: The environment parameters associated with the study.

events.description: The events associated with the study.

factors.description: The factors associated with the study.

biomaterials.description: The biological materials associated with the study.

observationVariables.description: The observated variables associated with the study.

observationUnits.description: The observation units associated with the study.

dataFiles.description: The data file associated with the study.

MIAPPE_version.description: The version of MIAPPE this dataset description should be compliant with.

MIAPPE+compliance.description: The result of the validation for MIAPPE compliance.
